name: Phil Papard Consulting
goal: Advice on EU Supply legislation and in particular Machinery and related industrial legislation, and on market surveillence in general including the use of ICSMS. Main goal is to help to improve market surveillece in the EU to better protect the public and workers from defective products.
interests: Competition, Customs, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Machinery Directive activities including updating the EU Guide to this Directive (2006/42/EC)
Standardization system including mandate to extend to off-shore equipment
Proposed Market Surveillance Regulation
